aiproj.checkers.game

Class CheckersBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • aiproj.checkers.game.CheckersBoard

  • public class CheckersBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    contains the board with the ability to modify it through a few moves.

      • getJumpLocations

        public final java.util.Hashtable<CheckersBoard.Coordinate,java.util.ArrayList<CheckersBoard.Coordinate>> getJumpLocations(CheckersPiece myPiece,
                                                                                                                          CheckersBoard.MovesList availableMoves)
        This method sucks im sorry. why the fuck doesnt this work.
        Parameters:
        myPiece - piece to check for jump locations at
        availableMoves - available moves for it to make
        Returns:
        a hashtable. key is a coordinate for the location the piece ends up and the value is the coordinates of the pieces that need to be deleted if the piece lands there.
